alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 1:56PM CDT until April 19 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN COLUMBIA COUNTY... At 155 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Poynette, or 11 miles east of Lake Wisconsin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Public reported golf ball sized hail near Poynette. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Lake Wisconsin, Lodi, Poynette, Fall River, Rio, Arlington, Otsego, Doylestown, Harmony Grove, and Okee. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
